nodes.text: Sarlin was a male Twi'lek who lived during the Galactic Civil War.
In 1 ABY, Sarlin resided in Mos Entha. While there, he received a contraband shipment from a smuggler working for Barak.
Sarlin is a non-player character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. In the game, Barak tasks smugglers with delivering contraband to various NPCs, including Sarlin.
